verbose_text: In our study, the mRNA expression of IL-13 was significantly decreased in H. fusiformis treated groups C and D. IL-13 is responsible for maintaining late-phase allergic inflammation and associated with mucous production by promoting the hyperplasia of goblet cells in the epithelium secreting the mucopolysaccharide (mucin) into the airway [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
